headline: Will Sysco’s (SYY) Leadership Transition Shape Its Long-Term Strategy and Competitive Edge?
summary: Sysco Corporation recently announced that Greg D. Bertrand, Executive Vice President and Global Chief Operating Officer, will transition to a non-executive senior advisor role on January 1, 2026, ahead of his retirement. This leadership transition includes a structured advisor agreement to help maintain operational continuity during a period of significant change for Sysco's management team. We’ll examine how Greg D. Bertrand’s planned shift to a senior advisor role may influence Sysco’s...

headline: Performance Food Group, US Foods end merger talks
summary: Food distributors Performance Food Group and US Foods have ended merger talks following a brief courtship. The post Performance Food Group, US Foods end merger talks appeared first on FreightWaves.
